visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a 3D column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Monthly Sales Data', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for labels and titles, Data series: Two series with data [2, 3, null, 4, 0, 5] and [4, null, 1, 2, 1, 3], Custom colors: Use shades of blue and green for the series, Additional configurations: Enable 3D options with specific angles and depth, set chart margins, and include a legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a 3D column chart with a dark background and white text for labels and titles. The chart is titled 'Monthly Sales Data' and includes two data series, each with specific data points and custom colors (shades of blue and green). The 3D options are enabled with specific angles (alpha and beta set to 15 degrees) and depth (250 units). The chart also includes a legend with white text and is styled to have specific margins for better visual appeal.
